name: Mattermost
intro: Mattermost is an open-source, self-hostable online chat service with file sharing, search, and integrations.

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
sed -e "s/mattermost:/mattermost:\n    ports:\n      - '127.0.0.1:3005:8065'/g" -i docker-compose.yml
mkdir -p ./volumes/app/mattermost/{config,data,logs,plugins,client/plugins,bleve-indexes}
mkdir -p ./volumes/db/data
# 70 is the standard uid/gid for "postgres" in Alpine
# https://github.com/docker-library/postgres/blob/master/13/alpine3.20/Dockerfile
sudo chown -R 70:70 ./volumes/db
# Download config which enables uploads and focalboard plugin
curl -o ./volumes/app/mattermost/config/config.json https://gist.githubusercontent.com/huksley/5721e15687fc63e2a197749c4752d80f/raw/1506bb567305ca4fa33db231fb6ab20a091a75f6/mattermost-config.json
sudo chown -R 2000:2000 ./volumes/app/mattermost

description:
Mattermost is a flexible, open source messaging platform that enables secure
team collaboration. It's a self-hosted alternative to proprietary SaaS
messaging and brings all your team communication into one place, making it
searchable and accessible anywhere.

This installation enables uploads and Focalboard plugin.

name: Twenty CRM
intro: The #1 Open-Source CRM
description: The #1 Open-Source CRM Modern, powerful, affordable platform to manage your customer relationships. Version 0.50.1. https://twenty.com/releases

files.content:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p data
mkdir -p data/tmp
mkdir -p data/local
mkdir -p data/db/pgroot/data
# TwentyCRM expects to run as 1000:1000
sudo chown 1000:1000 data/local
sudo chown 1000:1000 data/tmp
# The server must be started by the user that owns the data directory.
sudo chown root:root data/db
# UID/GID which runs postgres in db container
sudo chown 101:103 -R data/db/pgroot
# data directory "/home/postgres/pgdata/pgroot/data" has invalid permissions 
# Permissions should be u=rwx (0700) or u=rwx,g=rx (0750)
sudo chmod 0700 data/db/pgroot/data
